changeSet.author: LognovAS
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO CONFIG_EXTENSION_POINT (GUID, EXTENSION_ID, TABLE_NAME) values (random_uuid(), 'org.saphka.entity.test.MyEntityExtension', 'MY_ENTITY'); INSERT INTO CONFIG_EXTENSION_FIELD (GUID, EXTENSION_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_TYPE, FIELD_LENGTH, FIELD_FRACTION) values (random_uuid(), 'org.saphka.entity.test.MyEntityExtension', 'FIRST', 'STRING', 40, 0); INSERT INTO CONFIG_EXTENSION_FIELD (GUID, EXTENSION_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_TYPE, FIELD_LENGTH, FIELD_FRACTION) values (random_uuid(), 'org.saphka.entity.test.MyEntityExtension', 'LAST', 'STRING', 40, 0); INSERT INTO CONFIG_EXTENSION_FIELD (GUID, EXTENSION_ID, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_TYPE, FIELD_LENGTH, FIELD_FRACTION) values (random_uuid(), 'org.saphka.entity.test.MyEntityExtension', 'AGE', 'NUMBER', 0, 0);
